trans-unit.source: Indicates that there was an error downloading either the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] manifests or the deployment's files to the client computer.
trans-unit.target: 指示已下载错误[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]清单或部署的文件复制到客户端计算机。

trans-unit.source: A DeploymentDownloadException can indicate that a number of problems occurred when the user tried to download a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application update: - The client's computer's network connection is down.
trans-unit.target: DeploymentDownloadException 可以表示许多问题发生时用户已尝试下载[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序更新:-客户端的计算机的网络连接已关闭。

trans-unit.source: - The Web server, FTP server, or file share hosting the update is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: -Web 服务器、 FTP 服务器或承载更新文件共享不可用。

trans-unit.source: - One or more of the files in the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment was not found.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个中的文件[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]找不到部署。

trans-unit.source: To obtain detailed error information about an exception, consult the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] error log.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取有关异常的错误详细的信息，请查阅[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]错误日志。
有关详细信息，请参阅[排查 ClickOnce 部署](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentDownloadException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentDownloadException"></xref> class with a message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentDownloadException"></xref>类使用的描述异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentDownloadException"></xref> class.
The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化的对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentDownloadException"></xref> class.
The message that describes the exception.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

If the `innerException` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`innerException`参数不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引发当前异常<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>处理内部异常的块。
